== Cover Insert ==

=== Front ===
* ''Circle Of Friends picture, logo and title as with standard Ubuntu media''
* Three CDs in one: 
*** Try Ubuntu without altering your system
*** Install Ubuntu to your Hard Disk
*** Install Free Applications in Microsoft Windows (see back)
* ''Version and chip architecture'' 

=== Back ===
* ''"What is Ubuntu?" and legal stuff as with standard Ubuntu media''
* ''The OpenCD project information:''
*** ''brief introduction to concept''
*** ''summaries for some included apps:''
***** Firefox
***** Thunderbird
***** OpenOffice.org
***** Gaim

=== Spine ===
* ''Circle Of Friends logo, title and "linux for human beings" all in one tiny line with room to spare for libraries' stickers''

== Booklet Content ==
=== Conceptual ===
* ''What is Ubuntu?''  - pull from http://doc.ubuntu.com
* ''Why is Ubuntu important?'' - touch on FOSS philosophy, Linux background - Work in progress started with <nowiki>[[attachment:why-isubuntu-important.odp]]</nowiki>  document. Please feel free to complete.

=== Practical ===
* ''How to boot from CD''
 Section completed: <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu-ohio-installing.odp]]</nowiki>
* ''How to install FOSS software in MS Windows - the LiveCD is also the OpenCD''
